createTaskDetails.description: Details about the task. This is only applicable if thread is of type task.

assignees.description: List of users or teams the task is assigned to

oldValue.description: The value of old object for which the task is created.

suggestion.description: The suggestion object for the task provided by the creator.

from.description: Name of the User (regular user or bot) posting the message

addressedTo.description: User or team this thread is addressed to in format <#E::{entities}::{entityName}::{field}::{fieldValue}.

about.description: Data asset about which this thread is created for with format <#E::{entities}::{entityType}::{field}::{fieldValue}
